name: Match (itch) (Omar)
description:
Every turn you take gets you closer to being attacked! The enemy counts down when you make a move and the size of your Match gets you more points so you can attack first or heal, so make it count!

Mouse to move gems.

Red button to attack.

Blue button to heal.

Made for MashUp Game Jam. Theme: SIZE MATTERS
